reviews.Title: Highly recommended
reviews.Comment:
Using this for last 1week,
So far very positive. Let's discuss the negatives first:
1. Speaker is loud, good quality but not stereo. In this price is a honest cutting from vivo.
2. Full of bloatwares, some significant effort a person needs to make all bloat apps uninstalled or permissions turned off.

Positives:
1. Camera, very well. Even hopeless 2MP macro lens did its job well.
2. 5g speed is good, got around 1.5Gbs with Jio
3. Display is good and bright, using in outdoors

reviews.Comment:
Serious Bug in the Camera Settings
I bought this phone, mainly because of the positive reviews about its camera. It's true that the camera quality is excellent. But there is a serious flaw in the settings of the camera which cannot be changed, unfortunately. The portrait mode will work only if there are less than 5 people in the frame. reviews.Title: Disappointing camera performance and lackluster featur
reviews.Comment:
Purchased a smartphone from Flipkart with high expectations for the camera and features, but unfortunately, my experience with the phone fell short of my expectations.

Although the phone's camera was touted as one of its key selling points, I found that it performed at a level similar to that of a budget smartphone. The photos lacked clarity, and the camera struggled in low-light conditions, resulting in grainy, poorly defined images. Moreover, the phone's other features did not stand out in...
